bibl.title: Political Developments in Boeotia.
bibl.note: From early times down to 362 B.C. - The Oxyrhynchus Historian has a detailed knowledge of the internal politics of Thebes and of the other Boeotian states both before and after the end of the Peloponnesian War.
bibl.seg: HAMMOND N.G.L., Political Developments in Boeotia.

From early times down to 362 B.C. - The Oxyrhynchus Historian has a detailed knowledge of the internal politics of Thebes and of the other Boeotian states both before and after the end of the Peloponnesian War.
